process.name: Asset Transmission
process.description: Describes the process of transmitting an asset from and to an specific actor. The process involves delivering metadata, crypto transactions and statistics.

step.title: Device A. Process Start
step.description: User selects Transmission operation to execute. Valids are: Asset Transfer \b Asset Redemption \b Asset Distribution.
step.name: Asset User

step.title: Device A. Creation of Transaction
step.description: New Business Transaction is created in Asset Transmission
step.name: Asset Transmission

step.title: Device A. Contract Creation
step.description: New Contract is created defining Digital Asset Properties.
step.name: Asset Transmission

step.title: Device A. Transaction Timeout definition
step.description: Time out agent is subscribed to start monitoring elapsed time and rollback if time limit is reached..
step.name: Timeout Notifier

step.title: Device A. Asset blocking
step.description: The asset is blocked so more operations are permitted for this asset.
step.name: Asset Block

step.title: Device A. Sends Asset Metadata
step.description: An Outgoing Asset Metadata is prepared to be send to the corresponding actor.
step.name: Outgoing Asset Metadata

step.title: Device A. Delivers Metadata on P2P
step.description: We send the metadata over the network. NS retries are defined in the contract of this transaction.
step.name: Asset Transmission

step.title: Device A. Statistics are stored.
step.description: Initial Asset Transmission statistics are stored with asset and actor information.
step.name: Asset Transmission

step.title: Device B. Receives metadata from P2P
step.description: New metadata is received by NS and event trigger to notify upper layers.
step.name: Asset Transmission

step.title: Device B. Incoming Metadata detected
step.description: We received the send metadata and is locally stored. New local contract will be stored.
step.name: Incoming Asset Metadata

step.title: Device B. New contract is created.
step.description: The received metadata is stored as a new contract.
step.name: Asset Transmission

step.title: Device B. Contract is validated.
step.description: The contract properties are validated to confirm if we are ok to receive the new asset or not..
step.name: Asset Factory

step.title: Process Interrupted
step.description: A validation did not pass, or error was thrown. We rollback the process and Asset is again editable.
step.name: Asset Issuing

process.name: Crypto Broker Reference Wallet Installation
process.description: Wallet Store installation procedure for the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet

step.title: User selects the Broker Wallet on the Wallet Store
step.description: The user enters the Wallet Store and selects the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet to install it
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Wallet Store invokes the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin
step.description: Notifies the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin so it can install the Wallet
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin processes installation request
step.description: Sends a request to the Wallet Resources Network Service, to gather the resources of the Reference Wallet to be installed
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Wallet Resources Network Service downloads wallet's resources
step.description: Downloads the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet's resources, from the GitHub repository
step.name: Wallet Resources

step.title: Processing of the Wallet's Navigation Structure
step.description: Processes the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fires an event which effectively registers the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Runtime

step.title: Setting the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet as Installed
step.description: Sets the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet as installed, and fires an event
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Sub App Manager requests resources for the Wallet's Sub Apps
step.description: Sends a request to the Sub App Resources Network Service so it can download the necessary resources (Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps)
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Sub App Resources Network Service downloads Sub App's resources
step.description: Downloads resources for Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Resources

step.title: Sub App Runtime parses the Navigation Structure and activates the Sub Apps
step.description: Processes the Navigation Structure of the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps and fires a event to activate them
step.name: Sub App Runtime

step.title: Setting the Sub Apps as Installed
step.description: The Sub App Manager Middleware sets the Sub Apps as Installed
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin processes installation request
step.description: Sends a request to the Wallet Resources Network Service, to gather the resources of the Reference Wallet to be installed

step.title: Wallet Resources Network Service downloads wallet's resources
step.description: Downloads the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet's resources, from the GitHub repository
step.name: Wallet Resources

step.title: Processing of the Wallet's Navigation Structure
step.description: Processes the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fires an event which effectively registers this
step.name: Wallet Runtime

step.title: Setting the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet as Installed
step.description: Sets the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet as installed, and fires an event
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Sub App Manager requests resources for the Wallet's Sub Apps
step.description: Sends a request to the Sub App Resources Network Service so it can download the necessary resources (Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps)
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Sub App Resources Network Service downloads Sub App's resources

step.title: Sub App Runtime parses the Navigation Structure and activates the Sub Apps
step.description: Processes the Navigation Structure of the Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps and fires a event to activate them

step.title: Setting the Sub Apps as Installed
step.description: The Sub App Manager Middleware sets the Sub Apps as Installed

process.name: Broker Identity - Reference Wallet association
process.description: A Broker associates one of his Identities to a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet

step.title: Broker selects a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet and requests the list of Identities
step.description: The Broker enter in a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet and requests the list of his identities to associate with this wallet
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Process the request of the list of Identities
step.description: Wallet module receives the request from the Reference Wallet to obtain the list of Identities. The module forwards the request to the Crypto Broker Identity Plugin
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return the Identities list
step.description: Crypto broker Identity returns the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return Identities list
step.description: The Crypto Broker Wallet Module returns the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Reference Wallet shows the list of Identities andthe Broker selects one
step.description: Displays the list to the Broker, he then selects one, requesting the wallet module to commit the association
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Processing of the Wallet - Identity association request
step.description: Wallet Module receives the request and indicates the Crypto Broker Actor Plugin to create the association
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Wallet - Identity association
step.description: The Wallet module registers the Wallet - Identity association in its database
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Process the request of the list of Identities

step.title: Return the Identities list
step.description: Crypto Customer Identity returns the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Return Identities list
step.description: The Crypto Customer Wallet Module returns the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Reference Wallet shows the list of Identities and the Customer selects one
step.description: Displays the list to the Customer, he then selects one, requesting the wallet module to commit the association
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Processing of the Wallet - Identity association request
step.description: Wallet Module receives the request and indicates the Crypto Customer Actor Plugin to create the association
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Wallet - Identity association
step.description: The Wallet module registers the Wallet - Identity association in its database

process.name: Publishing the Crypto Broker Identity
process.description: The Broker publishes his Identity, making it visible to the Fermat Network

step.title: Broker selects an Identity and selects 'Publish'
step.description: The Broker selects one of his associated identities and publishes it. This requests the wallet module to change the state of this identity to Public
step.name: Crypto Broker Identity

step.title: Forward the request to the actor in order to publish the identity
step.description: The Crypto Broker Identity Sub App Module forwards this request to the Crypto Broker Actor
step.name: Crypto Broker Identity

step.title: Changes the status of the Identity to Public
step.description: The Crypto Broker Actor modifies the status of the Identity to Public
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Commits status change in database
step.description: The Crypto Broker Identity Plugin changes its database to reflect the new Public status of the selected Identity
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Sends the Identity to the Actor Network Service
step.description: The Crypto Broker Actor Plugin sends the Identity's Information to the Actor Network Service
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Consults the details of the identity to publish
step.description: The Crypto Broker Actor Network Seervice consults the details of the identity to publish and finally sends it to the Fermat Network
step.name: Crypto Broker

process.name: Customer requests a connection to a Broker
process.description: A Crypto Customer sends a connection request to a Crypto Broker, in order to be able to see his products and start a negotiation

step.title: Broker selection and request submission
step.description: The Customer selects a Broker from the list of Brokers, and submits the request to make a connection
step.name: Crypto Broker Community

step.title: Route request to Network Service
step.description: The module routes this request to the Network Service so that it reaches the selected Broker
step.name: Crypto Broker Community

step.title: Call the Broker to deliver the request
step.description: The network service places a call to the broker, delivering the request via the Fermat Network.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Routing of the Customer's request through the network
step.description: The request is then transported through the communication layer, using one of the available channels
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Request reception on the Broker's side
step.description: The Network Service receives the request and informs the Crypto Broker Actor
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Request recording and notification
step.description: The request is saved and a notification to the Broker is generated
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Records the notification
step.description: The the notification is saved, and the OS core library is notified.
step.name: Notification

step.title: Sends notification to the OS
step.description: The notification manager displays the notification to the OS, notifying the Broker of the connection request
step.name: Notification Manager

process.name: Broker accepts a connection from a Customer
process.description: A Crypto Broker accepts a connection request send by a Crypto Customer

step.title: Request list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: The Broker requests a list of Crypto Customers waiting to connect to him
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Forward request of list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: The module routes this request to the Actor Plugin to get the list
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Returns list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: Plugin consults its database to get the Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.description: The module returns the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Customer selection from returned Customer list
step.description: Shows the Broker the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection so that he can select one to accept
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Register the acceptance of the connection
step.description: The Crypto Customer Community Module routes this request to the Actor so it can register the new connection
step.name: Crypto Customer Community

step.title: Register the new connection in database
step.description: Changes in database the state of the connection to Accepted, while also notifying the Network Service to forward the change to the Crypto Customer
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Sends the message of the accepted connection to the Crypto Customer
step.description: Forwards the change of state to the Crypto Customer's device, that the connection request has been accepted
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Receives the accepted changed state
step.description: Receives the state change of the acceptance of the connection by the Broker, while also sending an event to the OS
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Sends notification to the OS
step.description: Sends the notification to the OS, to notify the Customer of the state change
step.name: Notification Manager

process.description: Holds (decrements available balance) an amount of cash money from the cash wallet

step.title: External plugin requests a hold of the funds from the cash wallet
step.description: For this, it sends a transaction UUID, an amount, a memo, and its own public key

step.title: Receives hold transaction request
step.description: Registers hold transaction internally as an ACKNOWLEDGED transaction
step.name: Hold

step.title: Internal agent processes hold transaction request
step.description: Tries to hold funds in wallet, if succeded, changes internal status to CONFIRMED, otherwise REJECTED
step.name: Hold

step.title: Tries to hold available funds
step.description: Processes the hold request by making a debit on the available balance of the cash wallet
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Unhold
process.description: Unholds (increments available balance) an amount of cash money from the cash wallet

step.title: External plugin requests am unhold of the funds from the cash wallet
step.description: For this, it sends a transaction UUID, an amount, a memo, and its own public key

step.title: Receives unhold transaction request
step.description: Registers unhold transaction internally as an ACKNOWLEDGED transaction
step.name: Unhold

step.title: Internal agent processes unhold transaction request
step.description: Tries to unhold funds in wallet, if succeded, changes internal status to CONFIRMED, otherwise REJECTED
step.name: Unhold

step.title: Tries to unhold available funds
step.description: Processes the unhold request by making a debit on the available balance of the cash wallet
step.name: Cash Money

process.name: Send Crypto to Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User sends a crypto to another intra user contact for a specific amount.

step.title: Select Intra User contact and send crypto
step.description: The customer selects a contact from the list and press send button, then complete Send forms and confirms the operation.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route send crypto to outgoing intra user plugin
step.description: The module sends it to the outgoing intra user plugin to create the crypto transaction.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Route send crypto metadata to network service
step.description: The outgoing intra user plugin routes this crypto transaction to the crypto transmission network service to send metadata.
step.name: Outgoing Intra Actor

step.title: Route send crypto to Crypto Bitcoin Vault
step.description: The outgoing intra user plugin routes this crypto transaction to the Crypto Bitcoin Vault to send btc to another actor and debit amount to Available Balance.
step.name: Outgoing Intra Actor

step.title: Send the crypto metadata
step.description: The network service sends the crypto metadata and informs that to Incoming Intra User Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Transmission

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The send metadata is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the crypto metadata
step.description: The network service receives the crypto metadata and informs that to Incoming Intra User Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Transmission

step.title: Call the incoming intra user plugin to deliver the sends bitcoins
step.description: The crypto network bitcoin places a call to the incoming intra user plugin and then it delivers the sends crypto.
step.name: Crypto Network Bitcoin

step.title: Apply transaction
step.description: The incoming intra user actor merge transaction metada with the bitcoin received and credited its on actor available balance.
step.name: Incoming Intra User

step.title: List Received Transaction
step.description: The wallet's user go to Home menu and list receive transactions.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

process.name: Send Payment Request to Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User sends a payment request to another intra user contact to request payment for a specific amount.

step.title: Select Intra User contact and submit payment request
step.description: The customer selects a contact from the list and submits the payment request.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route Send to Outgoing Intra Actor Plugin
step.description: The module routes this crypto send to the Outgoing Intra Actor Plugin to send the actor selected.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Send metadata to network service
step.description: The Outgoing Intra Actor plugin routes the send metadata to the network service to send payment information to actor selected.
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.title: Call the intra user to deliver the payment request
step.description: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the payment request via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the payment request
step.description: The network service receives the payment request and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Records the request
step.description: The payment request is saved with the type received and associated to intra user actor .
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.title: Return payment request list
step.description: The module returns the payement request receive list.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: List Received Payment Request
step.description: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request receive.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

process.name: Refuse Payment Request from Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User refuse a payment request sent by another actor.

step.title: Select payment request record to refuse
step.description: The actor selects a payment request from the list and press deny button.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route request to payment request plugin
step.description: The module routes this payment request refuse to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Route refuse to network service
step.description: The module routes this refuse to the network service to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Call the intra user to deliver the refuse
step.description: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the refuse via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the payment request
step.description: The network service receives the refuse and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Update the request status
step.description: The payment request is update with the status deny.
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.title: Return payment request send list
step.description: The module returns the payement request send list.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: List Send Payment Request
step.description: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request send, and show this status.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

process.name: Accept Payment Request From Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User accept a payment request sent by another actor.

step.title: Select payment request receive and accept it
step.description: The customer selects a payment request from the receive list and press accept button.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route request acceptance to plugin
step.description: The module routes this acceptance to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to apply the payment to the intra user actor.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Route acceptance to network service
step.description: The Crypto Payment Request Plugin routes this acceptance to the network service to inform the actor intra user about payment acceptance.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Route acceptance to Outgoing Intra User
step.description: The Crypto Payment Request Plugin notifies the outgoing intra user plugin to generate the send crypto transaction. And continuous workflow of sending btc an intra user actor
step.name: Outgoing Intra User

step.title: Call the intra user to deliver the acceptance message
step.description: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the message via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The acceptance message is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the acceptance notification
step.description: The network service receives the acceptance notification and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Update the Payment request
step.description: The payment request is updated with the Request Action in state INFORM_APPROVAL .
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.description: Raises an event indicating the arrival of a new connection request.
step.name: Artist

process.name: An artist accepts a fan connection
process.description: The artist sees a connection request and accepts it.

step.title: Register the acceptance of a connection.
step.description: A request connection request is selected to approve it.
step.name: Artist Community

step.title: Submit request acceptance.
step.description: Route the acceptance to notify to the connection petitioner
step.name: Artist Community

step.title: Send acceptance to a remote device.
step.description: Send the connection acceptance to a remote device.
step.name: Artist

step.title: Route the connection acceptance to a remote device.
step.description: Route the connection acceptance to a remote device through the P2P network.
step.name: Artist

step.title: Receive the connection acceptance.
step.description: Receive a message with the connection acceptance.
step.name: Artist

step.title: Send notification to OS.
step.description: Raises an event indicating the arrival of a new connection acceptance.
step.name: Artist

step.title: The connection is registered in Fan identity.
step.description: The Fan identity is updated with the connection.
step.name: Fan

step.title: The external platform identity is updated.
step.description: The Tokenly Fan identity is updated with the connection.
step.name: Fan

process.name: The fan to artist connection request is not accepted
process.description: The artist sees a connection request and rejects it.

step.title: Register the denial of a connection.
step.description: A request connection request is selected to reject it.
step.name: Artist Community

step.title: Submit request rejection.
step.description: Route the rejection to notify to the connection petitioner
step.name: Artist Community

step.title: Send rejection to a remote device.
step.description: Send the connection rejection to a remote device.
step.name: Artist

step.title: Route the connection rejection to a remote device.
step.description: Route the connection rejection to a remote device through the P2P network.
step.name: Artist

step.title: Receive the connection rejection.
step.description: Receive a message with the connection rejection.
step.name: Artist

step.title: Send notification to OS.
step.description: Raises an event indicating the arrival of a new connection rejection.
step.name: Artist
